link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://xbrl.org/2010/filter/aspect-cover http://www.xbrl.org/2010/aspect-cover-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/boolean http://www.xbrl.org/2008/boolean-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/consistency http://www.xbrl.org/2008/consistency-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/concept http://www.xbrl.org/2008/concept-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/dimension http://www.xbrl.org/2008/dimension-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/existence http://www.xbrl.org/2008/existence-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/entity http://www.xbrl.org/2008/entity-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/formula http://www.xbrl.org/2008/formula.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/label http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-label.xsd http://www.xbrl.org/2003/linkbase http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-linkbase-2003-12-31.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/match http://www.xbrl.org/2008/match-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message http://www.xbrl.org/2010/generic-message.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/period http://www.xbrl.org/2008/period-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/tuple http://www.xbrl.org/2008/tuple-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/unit http://www.xbrl.org/2008/unit-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/value http://www.xbrl.org/2008/value-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/variable http://www.xbrl.org/2008/variable.xsd http://xbrl.org/2005/xbrldt http://www.xbrl.org/2005/xbrldt-2005.xsd http://www.xbrl.org/2003/instance http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-instance-2003-12-31.xsd http://www.xbrl.org/2003/XLink http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xl-2003-12-31.xsd http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xlink-2003-12-31.xsd

gen:link.msg:message: Company's financial year start date is MUST be reported.
Tarikh mula tahun kewangan syarikat MESTI dilaporkan.
If filer selects option as "EA5A" from "Type of submission" THEN "Status of company" should be "Private company".
Jika pemfail memilih pilihan sebagai "EA5A" daripada "Jenis serahan" KEMUDIAN "Status syarikat" hendaklah "Private Company".
Company's financial year end date is MUST be reported
Tarikh akhir tahun kewangan Syarikat MESTI dilaporkan

When filer selects option as "Other reasons" from "Reason for Extension of time" THEN "Description of reason why apply for extension of time for circulation of financial statements and reports" MUST be reported

variable:precondition.test: ($V3 eq "EA5A" and $V1 eq "Other reasons") or ($V3 eq "EA8" and $Parameter1 eq "EA5A" and $V1 eq "Other reasons")
($V3 eq "EA5A" and $V1 eq "Other reasons") or ($V3 eq "EA8" and $Parameter1 eq "EA5A" and $V1 eq "Other reasons")

gen:link.msg:message: Apabila pemfail memilih pilihan "Other reasons" daripada "Sebab Pelanjutan masa" KEMUDIAN "Penerangan sebab memohon pelanjutan masa bagi edaran penyata kewangan dan laporan" MESTI dilaporkan

variable:precondition.test: ($V3 eq "EA5A" and $V1 eq "Other reasons") or ($V3 eq "EA8" and $Parameter1 eq "EA5A" and $V1 eq "Other reasons")

gen:link.msg:message: When filer selects option as "Change financial year end" from "Reason for Extension of time" THEN "Company's new financial year end date" MUST be reported

variable:precondition.test: ($V3 eq "EA5A" and $V1 eq "Change financial year end") or ($V3 eq "EA8" and $Parameter1 eq "EA5A" and $V1 eq "Change financial year end")

gen:link.msg:message: Apabila pemfail memilih pilihan "Change financial year end" daripada "Sebab Pelanjutan masa" KEMUDIAN "Tarikh akhir tahun kewangan baharu syarikat" MESTI dilaporkan

variable:precondition.test: ($V3 eq "EA5A" and $V1 eq "Change financial year end") or ($V3 eq "EA8" and $Parameter1 eq "EA5A" and $V1 eq "Change financial year end")

gen:link.msg:message: If filer selects option as "Other reasons" from "Reason for Extension of time" THEN "Company's new financial year end date" IS NOT applicable
Apabila pemfail memilih pilihan "Other reasons" daripada "Sebab pelanjutan masa" KEMUDIAN "Tarikh akhir tahun kewangan baharu syarikat" TIDAK terpakai

variable:precondition.test: ($V3 eq "EA5A" and $V1 eq "Other reasons") or ($V3 eq "EA8" and $Parameter1 eq "EA5A" and $V1 eq "Other reasons")

gen:link.msg:message: Proposed date on which financial statements and reports will be circulated MUST be reported
Cadangan tarikh penyata kewangan dan laporan akan diedarkan MESTI dilaporkan
Date of submission should be within 6 months from "Company's financial year end date"
Tarikh serahan hendaklah dalam tempoh 6 bulan dari "Tarikh akhir tahun kewangan syarikat"
Reason for Extension of time MUST be reported.
Sebab pelanjutan masa MESTI dilaporkan.
Company's financial year end date must be greater than Company's financial year start date
Tarikh akhir tahun kewangan Syarikat mestilah lebih besar daripada tarikh mula tahun kewangan Syarikat
